scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a haloed male figure, identified as Saint Peter, standing in an outdoor landscape. He is dressed in a blue tunic with a golden collar and a red mantle lined with fur. His left hand holds a book, while his right hand points towards it. In his left hand, he also holds a set of keys. The background features a stylized tree on the left, rolling green hills, and a rocky outcrop on the right. The sky is a pale blue.
